Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery Gordion cup; interior: trace of reserved band at junction with lip, glazed black below; exterior: handle zone reserved; below, single narrow black band and glazed lower wall; inscription in handle zone.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.431.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B601.6.4)
